name: Train Pirate
description:
You are a Train Pirate in the Wild West, and you've just got your biggest catch yet, a stampede of abandoned trains, speeding off into the distance! Only problem is you don't actually know how to drive a train.

Hop between trains dodging perilous crashes with your trusty lasso, strip down carriages to make fuel, and save it by detatching carriages by shooting them! You're gonna keep going until you stop in your tracks or die trying.

This game was made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam, with the theme "Joined Together". All code and art was done by myself, with the exception of the character on the main menu, who was designed by @cydderoonies on Instagram.
